docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome to MyFile documentation! Use the left menu to navigate through sections.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: Explain your mkdocs.yml settings here: - site_name, docs_dir - Confluence plugin block: host_url, space, parent_page_name, etc.

docs.title: Improvements
docs.text: Next step: Automate with GitHub Actions on each push.

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text: Use mkdocs build -v for detailed logs—it often shows exactly where things broke.
